name: Druid's Tale: Crystal Cave
description: RPG game with crafting elements. Become a Druid that is protecting your land from darkness. Make potions, poisons and even alcohol. Trade your products with neutral factions and fight the forces of evil. The game emphasizes new solutions that have not been applied anywhere else!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 / 8 / 10 Processor: Intel Core i3 Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: nVIDIA GeForce GTX 650 / AMD Radeon HD 5700 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 2 GB available space Additional Notes: Can use Leap Motion device.
